mapper.select: select o.ID as id, o.Order_id as orderid, o.Tower_wx_id as towerwxid, o.Tower_first_fee as towerfirstfee, o.Tower_end_fee as towerendfee, o.Tower_id as towerid, o.Tower_fee as towerfee, o.Tower_ht_id as towerhtid, o.Tower_ht_imag as towerhtimag, o.Tower_file as towerfile, o.Tower_delay_reason as towerdelayreason, case o.Tower_state when 0 then '抢单' when 1 then '弃单' when 2 then '交单' when 3 then '审核拒绝' when 4 then '审核成功(签约)' when 5 then '付首款审核中' when 6 then '付首款审核成功' when 7 then '付首款审核拒绝' when 8 then '付尾款审核中' when 9 then '完成' when 10 then '付尾款审核拒绝' when 11 then '超时过期' when 12 then '延期' when 13 then '延期申请中' when 14 then '延期拒绝' end as towerstatename, o.Tower_state as towerstate, CONVERT(varchar, o.Tower_add_time , 120 ) as toweraddtime, case Tower_yq_count when 0 then CONVERT(varchar, DATEADD(HOUR,96,o.Tower_add_time) , 120 ) when 1 then CONVERT(varchar, DATEADD(HOUR,(96*2),o.Tower_add_time) , 120 ) end as towerendtime, t.Tower_name towername, c.City_name as towercityname, a.area_name as towerareaname, case t.Tower_level when 1 then '一级站址' when 2 then '二级站址' when 3 then '三级站址' when 4 then '四级站址' end as towerlevel, t.Tower_j as towerj, t.Tower_w as towerw, t.Tower_info as towerinfo, t.Tower_manager as towermanager, t.Tower_manager_name as towermanagername, p.Tower_type_name as towertypename from tower_order_detail o left join tower_tower_info t on t.ID=o.Tower_id left join tower_area a on a.ID=t.Tower_area left join tower_city c on c.City_id=a.City_id left join tower_tower_type p on p.ID=t.Tower_type where 1=1 and o.id=#{id}

select u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, a.area_name as userareaname, c.City_name as usercityname, (case u.user_level when 4 then '四级用户' when 3 then '三级用户' when 2 then '二级用户' when 1 then '一级用户' end ) as userlevel, u.User_company as usercompany, (case u.User_business when 1 then '运营商' when 2 then '基站设计/监理/代维公司' when 3 then '房产中介' when 4 then '物业公司' when 5 then '机关事业单位' when 6 then '村镇管理' when 7 then '基站土建施工' when 8 then '基站配套施工' when 9 then '室分集成商工' when 10 then '装修公司' when 11 then '电力行业' when 12 then '其他' end )as userbusiness, oi.Order_count as ordercount, oi.Succ_count as succcount, oi.Ing_count as ingcount, oi.Fail_count as failcount, oi.Cancel_count as cancelcount
from tower_user_info u left join tower_area a on a.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city c on c.City_id=a.City_id left join tower_user_order_info oi on oi.Wx_id=u.Wx_id where u.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;
mapper.update:
update tower_order_detail set
Tower_abandon_time=GETDATE(),
Tower_ht_id=#{htid}, Tower_ht_imag=#{image}, Tower_first_fee=#{firstfee}, Tower_end_fee=#{endfee},
Tower_file=#{image},
Tower_complete_time=GETDATE(),
Tower_yq_count=1, Tower_end_date=DATEADD(hh,96,Tower_end_date),
Tower_state=#{towerstate} where ID=#{orderid} ;

update tower_user_order_info set
Fail_count=Fail_count+#{failcount},
Succ_count=Succ_count+#{succcount},
Ing_count=Ing_count+#{ingcount},
Reject_count=Reject_count+#{rejectcount},
Order_count=Order_count+0 where Wx_id=#{wxid} ;

update tower_user_charge set
Charge=Charge+#{charge},
Get_now=Get_now+#{getnow},
Getting_now=Getting_now+#{gettingnow},
All_geting=All_geting+#{allgetting},
Experience=Experience+#{experience},
Score=Score+#{score},
Wx_id=#{wxid} where Wx_id=#{wxid};
mapper.select: select c.ID as id, c.Wx_id as wxid, c.Charge as charge, c.Get_now as getnow, c.Getting_now as gettingnow, c.All_geting as allgeting, c.Experience as experience, c.Score as score, u.User_level as userlevel from tower_user_charge c left join tower_user_info u on u.Wx_id=c.Wx_id where 1=1 and c.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;
select o.ID as orderid, o.Tower_wx_id as towerwxid, o.Tower_id as towerid from tower_order_detail o where 1=1 and Tower_end_date <= GETDATE() and Tower_state in ( 0,12,13 ) ;

select o.Wx_id as wxid, o.Order_count as ordercount, o.Succ_count as succcount, o.Ing_count as ingcount, o.Fail_count as failcount, o.Cancel_count as cancelcount, o.Concancel_count as concancelcount from tower_user_order_info o where o.Wx_id=#{wxid} ;
mapper.update: update tower_user_order_info set Fail_count=Fail_count+1, Ing_count=Ing_count-1, Concancel_count=Concancel_count+1, Time_count=Time_count+1 where Wx_id=#{towerwxid};
mapper.select: select o.Order_id as orderid, CONVERT(varchar, o.Tower_add_time, 120 ) as toweraddtime, u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, case o.Tower_state when 0 then '抢单' when 1 then '弃单' when 2 then '交单' when 3 then '审核拒绝(签约)' when 4 then '审核成功(签约)' when 5 then '付首款审核中' when 6 then '付首款审核成功' when 7 then '付首款审核拒绝' when 8 then '付尾款审核中' when 9 then '完成' when 10 then '付尾款审核拒绝' when 11 then '超时过期' when 12 then '延期' when 13 then '延期申请中' when 14 then '延期拒绝' end as towerstatename, ua.area_name as userareaname, uc.City_name as usercityname from tower_order_detail o left join tower_user_info u on u.Wx_id=o.Tower_wx_id left join tower_area ua on ua.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city uc on uc.City_id=ua.City_id where 1=1 and o.Tower_id=#{towerid} order by o.Tower_add_time desc ;

select o.Order_id as orderid, CONVERT(varchar, o.Tower_add_time, 120 ) as toweraddtime, u.User_name as username, u.User_tele as usertele, case o.Tower_state when 0 then '抢单' when 1 then '弃单' when 2 then '交单' when 3 then '审核拒绝(签约)' when 4 then '审核成功(签约)' when 5 then '付首款审核中' when 6 then '付首款审核成功' when 7 then '付首款审核拒绝' when 8 then '付尾款审核中' when 9 then '完成' when 10 then '付尾款审核拒绝' when 11 then '超时过期' when 12 then '延期' when 13 then '延期申请中' when 14 then '延期拒绝' end as towerstatename, ua.area_name as userareaname, uc.City_name as usercityname, t.Tower_name as towername from tower_order_detail o left join tower_user_info u on u.Wx_id=o.Tower_wx_id left join tower_area ua on ua.ID=u.User_area left join tower_city uc on uc.City_id=ua.City_id left join tower_tower_info t on t.ID=o.Tower_id where 1=1 and o.Tower_id=#{towerid} order by o.Tower_add_time desc ;
